function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conditional lockdown based on infection curve threshold","Impact":"Risk of economic recession and potential ineffective control of disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing a strong and reliable healthcare system, effective testing, and enforced social isolation measures","Technologies":"Healthcare technologies for testing, accurate data monitoring and analysis","People":"General population, businesses, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of vertical isolation policy","Impact":"Potential ineffectiveness in controlling severe cases of disease and economic impact","Mitigation":"Reevaluate the policy based on scientific evidence, implement targeted interventions for high-risk groups","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, data analytics for targeted interventions","People":"Elderly, people with pre-existing diseases, general population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
